title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 200.3 - Additional provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 200.3 - Additional provisions

State Regulations
(a) With
regard to public access to the records of the Department of Taxation and

Finance and the Tax Commission, see Part 2370 of this Title. (b) With regard to communicating tax policies
and interpretations, see Part 2375 of this Title. (c) With regard to procedural regulations, see Parts 2390 and 2393 of this Title. (d) With regard to Tax Appeals Tribunal Rules
of Practice and Procedure, see Part 3000 of this Title. (e) With regard to Bureau of Conciliation and

Mediation Services procedural rules, see Part 4000 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
200.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
